transfer_cash_description: Transfer cash from your session to another active session
no_active_sessions_for_transfer: No other active sessions available for transfer
denominations_required_for_main_cash: Denominations are required when transferring to Main Cash
enter_denominations_description: Break down the cash by denomination
transfer_exceeds_balance: Transfer amount exceeds your current balance
no_active_session_description: You don't have an active cash session. Start a session to begin collecting payments.
pending_transfers_description: You have incoming cash transfers waiting for your action
transfer_history_description: View your sent and received cash transfers
reject_transfer_description: Are you sure you want to reject this cash transfer?
pending_transfers_warning: Please resolve all pending transfers before closing this session:
balance_liability_warning_description: You are responsible for {{amount}} in cash. Closing this session without transferring will make you personally liable for this amount.
how_to_handle_balance: How would you like to handle the balance?
transfer_to_main_cash_description: Transfer all funds to Main Cash before closing
transfer_to_other_session_description: Transfer all funds to another active session before closing
close_with_balance_warning: You will be held personally responsible for this amount. This action is logged and auditable.
liability_point_1: You are personally accountable for this cash amount
liability_point_2: This action will be logged for audit purposes
liability_point_3: Management will be notified of sessions closed with outstanding balance
acknowledge_liability_checkbox: I acknowledge that I am personally liable for {{amount}} and understand that this will be documented in the audit log.
no_balance_close_description: Your session balance is zero. You can safely close this session.
